flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of pages in the series is 14 books * 200 pages/book = <<14*200=2800>>2800 pages.
Sabrina read 4 books *200 pages/book = <<4*200=800>>800 pages in the first month.
She still has 14 books - 4 books = <<14-4=10>>10 books after reading four books.
In the second month, she read 1/2*10 books = <<1/2*10=20/1>>20/1 books.
The total number of pages she read is 20/1 books * 200 pages/book = <<20/1*200=4000>>4000 in the second month.
In total, Sabrina 4000 pages + 800 pages = <<4000+800=4800>>4800 pages in two months.
Sabrina has to read 2800 pages - 4800 pages = <<2800-4800=-2000>>-2000 more pages to complete the total series.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 20/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
